numberOfPositions.title: SIM number
numberOfPositions.description: defines how many separate positions should be distributed between offset and offset + patternPeriod

"lightsheetalignment":[{"name":"Y1","position":7700},{"name":"Z1","position":-561},{"name":"MEMS_3_B_X","position":168},{"name":"MEMS_3_B_Y","position":720},{"name":"Y2","position":7740},{"name":"Z2","position":-1181},{"name":"MEMS_3_A_X","position":25},{"name":"MEMS_3_A_Y","position":-100}],
